sense.name: describe, account
sense.examples: They reported seeing a man flee the apartment after the shooting. He reported feeling a sharp pain in his left side. Their findings will be reported in the next issue of Science. She is reporting the business news from Hong Kong these days.

sense.name: inform on
sense.examples: She reported her neighbor to the authorities. I'll report him to the principal.

sense.name: be accountable to
sense.examples: The new hire will report directly to the CEO. He reports for duty at 0700 tomorrow.

sense.name: report out
sense.commentary: Return a bill after consideration and revision to a legislative body.
